Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Foster
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Foster, Ashland and Clark: due to, parade/festival near Clark/Foster.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Foster, Ashland, Clark and over regular route due to a parade/festival near Clark/Foster.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Purple Line Service Delayed near Central
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains are standing near Central due to fire department activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains are standing near Central due to fire department activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
